name: Centennial
details: In this parking lot, it can be seen the difference in activity before and after the Covid-19 pandemic.

name: Wuhan
details: According to ESA (The European Space Agency), the reduction in traffic and industrial activity is responsible for the decrease in nitrogen dioxide concentrations in the atmosphere. It leads to a better respiratory health in general.

name: Venice Province
details: It is possible to identify a bigger quantity of phytoplankton, related to the 2020 year, as well as the moving of aquatic transport, boats, and ships. Because of social isolation, there was a decrease of phytoplankton, making water cleaner and also of transportation, generating Ambiental and economic impact, respectively.

name: Theran Province
details: The number of commercial flights was reduced dramatically in the past months around the world. It can be shown clearly in the pictures.

name: Haratal Bab And Ash Shamiyyah
details: Mecca is considered one of the most religious cities and are expected at least 13M of people during the year. However, during the pandemic, this number has decreased, and also not only the religion was affected due the virus but the commercial activities as well, leading to an increasing in unemployment rates.

name: San Francisco
details: In this parking lot, it can be seen the difference in activity before and after the Covid-19 pandemic.

name: Ashidahakkano
details: According to Japan Meteorological Agency, the decrease in temperature in Japan is due to the reduction of nitrogen dioxide in the atmosphere.

name: Old Town
details: According to National Centers For Environmental Information and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, because of Covid-19 pandemic, it is observed normal levels of precipitation in the region.
